author: timbeiko
content: On last ACD, there were questions about if other teams aside from Uniswap would benefit from EIP-1153: Arbitrum just left a note saying they would as well: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-1153-transient-storage-opcodes/553/47?u=fredlacs

author: bridge-bot
content:
<dankrad> Question on 3607: It is currently marked as "in review". However I remember that we discussed that we actually treat it as if the behaviour should *always* have been like this, i.e. clients just fix it whenever.
Should it not then be marked as final? Or should we put it on the agenda again and if everyone agrees that this is how we define correct behaviour, mark it as final?

author: bridge-bot
content: <dankrad> So it should probably be marked as final then?

author: lightclient
content: Yes, you'll just have to make a PR to move to last call then after the 2 week period, make a PR marking it final

author: bridge-bot
content: <timbeiko> someone asked about this recently and I believe all teams had it implemented
